name: E+H_Processes
template:
CASE 
    WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'B' THEN 
        CONCAT ('Service - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)
			
	WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'C' THEN 
        CONCAT('Analyses - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)
	WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'D' THEN 
        CONCAT('Flow - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
		WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'E' THEN 
        CONCAT('Advanced Analysis - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)				
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'F' THEN 
        CONCAT('Level - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'G' THEN 
        CONCAT('***bulk flow - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'H' THEN 
        CONCAT('Moisture - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'M' THEN 
        CONCAT('Metso Product - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'N' THEN 
        CONCAT('Tank Gauging - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'P' THEN 
        CONCAT('Pressure - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'R' THEN 
        CONCAT('Registration - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'S' THEN 
        CONCAT('System Product - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'T' THEN 
        CONCAT('Temperature - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'U' THEN 
        CONCAT('Engineering - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'W' THEN 
        CONCAT('Documentation - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'X' THEN 
        CONCAT('Service General - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
				WHEN LEFT (VBAP.PRODH, 1) = 'Y' THEN 
        CONCAT('General - ',
        CASE 
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '0' THEN 'Delivery from SC stock'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '1' THEN 'Direct delivery'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '2' THEN 'Delivery via SC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '3' THEN 'Delivery via LC'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '4' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant via 3rd party order div.'
			WHEN VBAP.ZZDLZ = '5' THEN 'Direct dispatch from master plant with division'
			END)		
			
    ELSE 'Other Strategy'
    
END

name: CT Subprocess_1
template:
{p1}_BETWEEN(
    PU_<%= from_occ %>("{p2}", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p4}" = {p5}),
    PU_<%= to_occ %>("{p2}", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p4}" = {p6})
)
CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE[<%= from_occ %>] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE[<%= to_occ %>], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", {p1}))

description: This KPI calculates the rate of considered activities performed by an automatic user type. (ACTIVITY LEVEL)
name: Automation Rate
template:
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0

/ 

(
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0
+
-- # Manual Activities
SUM( CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0
)

name: Repeated Activities
template:
SUM(CASE 
    WHEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3}) 
    AND ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") >= 2 
    THEN ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") -1 
    ELSE 0 
END)

description: Share of Purchase Order Items in which Activities (user defined) have happened more than once.
name: Repeated Activity Rate
template:
COUNT(DISTINCT 
      CASE WHEN ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") >= 2 
      AND "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}" IN ({p3})
      THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END
)
/
COUNT_TABLE("{p4}")

name: Missing Activities
template: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROCESS NOT EQUALS {p2} THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)

description: This KPI calculates the median time from the process start until the process end in days.
name: CT Total

description: Counts the number of manual activities (out of the considered activities)
name: Manual Activities
template:
SUM( CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
END )*1.0

name: Missing Activity Rate
template:
100.0*(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROCESS NOT EQUALS {p2} THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/ 
COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY"))

description: This KPI calculates the rate of considered activities performed by an automatic user type. (CASE LEVEL)
name: Automation Rate PU
template:
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p5})
))

/ 

(
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p5})
))

+
-- # Manual Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p5})
))
)

description: Counts the number of automated activities (user defined)
name: Automated Activities
template:
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
END )

name: Sales Requirement Types
template:
CASE WHEN COALESCE(VBAP.BEDAE, '') <> '' THEN

	CASE 
		WHEN T459K.KNTTP = 'E' AND T459K.ATPPR = '' AND T459K.BEDSD = '' AND T459K.MNTGA = '2' THEN 'Service / Maintenance'

		WHEN T459K.KNTTP = 'M' THEN 
			CONCAT('MTO W/O Sales Order Accounting',
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN ISNULL(T459K.KONFI) = 0 OR ISNULL(TVAP.STRAT) = 0 THEN ' VC Material' ELSE '' END, 
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN T459K.MNTGA <> '0' THEN ' Direct Assembly'  ELSE '' END,
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(T459K.KZBWS, '') <> '' THEN ' with special stock valuation' ELSE '' END,
			CASE WHEN COALESCE(T459K.KALSM_K, '') <> '' THEN ' with Costing' ELSE '' END
			))))

		WHEN T459K.KNTTP = 'E' THEN
			CONCAT('MTO Sales Order Accounting ',
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN ISNULL(T459K.KONFI) = 0 OR ISNULL(TVAP.STRAT) = 0 THEN ' VC Material' ELSE '' END,
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(T459K.KALSM_K, '') <> '' THEN ' with Costing' ELSE '' END,
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN COALESCE(T459K.KZBWS, '') <> '' THEN ' with special stock valuation' ELSE '' END,
			CASE WHEN T459K.MNTGA <> '0' THEN ' Direct Assembly / Project' ELSE '' END
			))))
		
		WHEN T459K.KNTTP = '' THEN 
			CONCAT('MTS',
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN T459K.ATPPR = '' THEN ' W/O ATP' ELSE '' END,
			CONCAT(CASE WHEN T459K.BEDSD = '' THEN ' W/O Requirement' ELSE '' END,
			CASE WHEN T459K.QUOTA = 'X' THEN ' Allocation' ELSE '' END
			)))

		ELSE 'Other Strategy'
		
	END

ELSE 'No Requirement SO Line'

END

description: Share of Purchase Order Items, in which at least one Undesired Activity (user defined) has happened.
name: Undesired Activity Rate
template:
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}" IN ({p3}) THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY")
